title: unable to interact or see Post game screen
body: at the conclusion of games (roughly 50% of the time) the post game screen will not be visible, and if I click on the league icon on the bottom toolbar of my screen nothing will happen. I can hear when players post a message in the post game lobby. but I can't see or do anything. Any ideas on a resolution?

replies.body:
Without logs or such things, this sounds like the "handoff" from the game server back to your client isn't happening for some reason.  This could happen from third party programs, firewalls, or potentially network issues.

Outside of not running any other third party programs, I'd suggest the steps in our [Connection Troubleshooting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) article.  If you still run into this problem, go ahead and submit a ticket so that we can get logs and troubleshoot further :)
